item.title: Google Sheets & Docs for Language Learning
item.description: What it is Cloud-based spreadsheet and document tools that enable collaborative language learning while practicing productivity vocabulary. How to use it for language learning Practice productivity vocabulary while actually organizing data, creating study trackers, or collaborative writing in your target language.
